attributes.action: STOP the new 4 point PIP rule
attributes.additional_details: The Government must reconsider this change. We MUST protect the most vulnerable among us and ensure their dignity through compassionate support. Therefore, we need to urge our Government to reassess this new rule.
attributes.background: The decision to introduce a new rule is threatening the lifeline for those who have fought through the degrading assessment process and finally won. This change WILL deny access to the daily living component to those who are genuinely in need but cannot score the 4 points in a single activity.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Stop PIP Cuts: Protect Support for Disabled People
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721918
